post.summary: Assign a role to an employee
post.description: This endpoint assigns the specified role to an employee without detaching existing roles. It is idempotent and will not create duplicates.

parameters.name: role
parameters.description: ID of the role to be assigned

parameters.name: employee
parameters.description: ID of the employee to whom the role is assigned

400.description: Could not assign employee this role

delete.summary: Unassign a role from an employee
delete.description: This endpoint detaches (removes) the specified role from an employee. If the employee does not have this role, no error is thrown.

parameters.name: role
parameters.description: ID of the role to be unassigned

parameters.name: employee
parameters.description: ID of the employee from whom the role will be removed

400.description: Could not unassign employee this role
